page.title: 09MAMMALS
page.content: {Stoat The stoat is about 12 inches long with a 4 inch tail.It is brown in the summer but is white in the winter. which allows it to catch its food more easily.The tip of its tail remains black. They feed on small mammals like voles,shrews,mice and some times baby rabbits.They have been seen on the moor and at Inverarnie. {Fox The fox eats rabbits,hares,grouse and lots of other game. They are quite hard to spot because they stay under cover in the day and come out to hunt in the night. The parents dig a hole in the ground where the female has her cubs. The home they have is called a den. Two of our boys have been with a game keeper to hunt a fox.
